name: Homegear::log
shortDescription: Writes a message to the script engine log file
description: This method writes a message to the script engine log and (if there are errors) to the error log file (/var/log/homegear/homegear-scriptengine.log and /var/log/homegear/homegear-scriptengine.err by default).

parameters.name: logLevel
parameters.description:
This is the log level of the message. If Homegear's log level value is lower than this value, no message is logged. Valid values are:
  • 1: Critical
  • 2: Error
  • 3: Warning
  • 4: Info
  • 5: Debug

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: This is the message that will be written to the log file. The date is prepended automatically.
